DOC.brief_summary: This prospective chart review/data collection study natural orifice translumenal endoscopic surgery ( NOTES ) ventral hernia repair , include questionnaire administer throughout study . Subjects enrol intend transvaginal NOTES ventral hernia repair . Data collect review 12 month post-op .
DOC.brief_title: Natural Orifice Translumenal Endoscopic Surgery ( NOTES ) : Laparoscopic Assisted Transvaginal Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Umbilical incisional hernia great 2 cm size 2 . Female , age 1875 3 . Mentally competent give inform consent 4 . Scheduled undergo transvaginal NOTES ventral hernia repair Exclusion : 1 . Pregnant woman 2 . Patients defect measure great 10 cm size 3 . Patients complex hernia require fascial mobilization closure 4 . Morbidly obese patient ( BMI > 45 )
